query:
WITH snapshot AS (
                    INSERT INTO snapshots (for_ref, content, last_updated, doc_id)
                    VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
                    RETURNING id
                )
                INSERT INTO refs (id, head, created)
                VALUES ($1, (SELECT id FROM snapshot), $3)
                ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET head = (SELECT id FROM snapshot)
